mapper.sql: id, car_record_id, car_pick_person, mention_fee, mention_subsidy, travel_fee, put_fee, put_subsidy, crossing_fee, mail_fee, freight_fee, billing_fee, oil_fee, cattle_fee, expense_fee, other_fee, pre_sale_fee, after_sale_fee, other_income_fee, ctime, utime
mapper.select: select auto_increment from information_schema.TABLES where TABLE_SCHEMA='cm' and TABLE_NAME='cm_car_cost'
mapper.insert: insert into cm_car_cost (id, car_record_id, car_pick_person, mention_fee, mention_subsidy, travel_fee, put_fee, put_subsidy, crossing_fee, mail_fee, freight_fee, billing_fee, oil_fee, cattle_fee, expense_fee, other_fee, pre_sale_fee, after_sale_fee, other_income_fee, ctime, utime) values (#{id},#{carRecordId},#{carPickPerson},#{mentionFee},#{mentionSubsidy},#{travelFee},#{putFee},#{putSubsidy},#{crossingFee},#{mailFee},#{freightFee}, #{billingFee},#{oilFee},#{cattleFee},#{expenseFee},#{otherFee},#{preSaleFee},#{afterSaleFee},#{otherIncomeFee},#{ctime},#{utime})
mapper.update:
update cm_car_cost
car_record_id = #{carRecordId},
car_pick_person = #{carPickPerson},
mention_fee = #{mentionFee},
mention_subsidy = #{mentionSubsidy},
travel_fee = #{travelFee},
put_fee = #{putFee},
put_subsidy = #{putSubsidy},
crossing_fee = #{crossingFee},
mail_fee = #{mailFee},
freight_fee = #{freightFee},
billing_fee = #{billingFee},
oil_fee = #{oilFee},
cattle_fee = #{cattleFee},
expense_fee = #{expenseFee},
other_fee = #{otherFee},
pre_sale_fee = #{preSaleFee},
after_sale_fee = #{afterSaleFee},
other_income_fee = #{otherIncomeFee},
utime = #{utime},
where id = #{id}
